featured.text: Psychologically, this exercise may increase communication between the body and the mind and enable one to deal with other people more effectively.
Waterproof chairs enable visitors to roam all over the park.
Girls develop an early connection between this area and the cerebral cortex, enabling them to talk about their feelings.
For example, a stress reaction can sometimes save a person’s life by releasing hormones that enable a person to react quickly and with greater energy in a dangerous situation.

other.text: The band also enables them to take part in electronic activities.
In this way, intimacy enables us to thrive and grow.

definition.zh_def: 使能，讓某事物能夠發生或運行。
definition.en_def: To make something possible or to allow it to function.
definition.example: The new software will enable users to edit documents more easily.
